channel.title: Asking Alexandria on
channel.description: Recent content in Asking Alexandria on

item.title: A Lesson Never Learned
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/your_god.md#i-tried-to-fight-but-did-you-listen-vyl-wnanory|Please, you have to help me, this is not my true face]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/your_god.md#i-tried-to-fight-but-did-you-listen-vyl-wnanory|If you could see my soul as I have seen my soul]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/your_god.

item.title: Another Bottle Down
item.description: [[songs/c/crying_vessel/necrozine/cosmic_featuring_kim_welsh_and_perry_pelonera.md#watching-you-vyl-wnanory|I’m so done with it, I won’t go back again and]] [[songs/c/crying_vessel/necrozine/cosmic_featuring_kim_welsh_and_perry_pelonera.md#watching-you-vyl-wnanory|I’m okay with this, that I’ll be on my own]] [[songs/c/crying_vessel/necrozine/cosmic_featuring_kim_welsh_and_perry_pelonera.

item.title: Believe
item.description: [[songs/a/archive/with_us_until_youre_dead/calm_now.md#youve-got-to-be-strict-vyl-wnanory|You’ve got to believe]] [[songs/a/archive/with_us_until_youre_dead/calm_now.md#youve-got-to-be-strict-vyl-wnanory|You’ve got to believe]] [[songs/p/pendulum/in_silico/showdown.md#well-its-been-such-a-long-time-coming-i-thought-youd-understand-vyl-wnanory|We’ve tried it all, tried everything but giving in]] [[songs/p/pendulum/in_silico/showdown.md#well-its-been-such-a-long-time-coming-i-thought-youd-understand-vyl-wnanory|I refuse to throw all that we have away]] [[songs/p/pendulum/in_silico/showdown.

item.title: Break Down The Walls
item.description: [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.md#and-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-somethin-wrong-vyl-wnanory|Close your eyes and leave all your fears behind, it’s alright]] [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.md#and-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-somethin-wrong-vyl-wnanory|Close your eyes and follow me until the end]] [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.

item.title: Breathless
item.description: [[songs/c/caliban/i_am_nemesis/davy_jones.md#get-lost-vyl-wnanory|Get the fuck away from me]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/band_of_brothers.md#ive-got-my-band-of-brothers-and-were-taken-to-the-streets-vyl-wnanory|I know that I have done wrong and continue to do so but without remorse]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/band_of_brothers.

item.title: Closure
item.description: [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/mind__the_perpetual_intercourse/one_time_one_place.md#one-time-one-time-one-place-vyl-wnanory|One last time]] Go [[songs/t/the_amity_affliction/let_the_ocean_take_me/dont_lean_on_me.md#let-the-ocean-take-me-vyl-wnanory|We’re back again, you know we’re not fucking around]] [[songs/t/the_amity_affliction/let_the_ocean_take_me/dont_lean_on_me.md#let-the-ocean-take-me-vyl-wnanory|Got a bottle of jack in our hands, you tryna’ keep up kid?

item.title: Creature
item.description: [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/post_verified_lifestyle.md#lets-get-it-vyl-wnanory|Deep in the shadows I’m fighting a battle]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/post_verified_lifestyle.md#lets-get-it-vyl-wnanory|The creature wants me screaming, screaming]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/post_verified_lifestyle.md#lets-get-it-vyl-wnanory|I think I’m losing, tired of choosing, I’m slipping down]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/post_verified_lifestyle.

item.title: Dear Insanity
item.description: [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.md#and-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-somethin-wrong-vyl-wnanory|Oh, sweet insanity]] [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.md#and-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-somethin-wrong-vyl-wnanory|You take my hand and walk me out into the dark]] [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.md#and-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-somethin-wrong-vyl-wnanory|We walk this road for hours and hours]] [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.

item.title: Dedication
item.description: [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.md#and-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-somethin-wrong-vyl-wnanory|You’ll never really find those perfect words]] [[songs/k/kanye_west/my_beautiful_dark_twisted_fantasy/runaway.md#and-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-yeah-i-always-find-somethin-wrong-vyl-wnanory|Something more than just Goodbye]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/post_verified_lifestyle.md#lets-get-it-vyl-wnanory|It’s hard to remember the good times when there’s just so much heartache]] [[songs/j/jpegmafia/all_my_heroes_are_cornballs/post_verified_lifestyle.

item.title: Don't Pray For Me
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/trouble.md#look-the-walls-closin-in-vyl-wnanory|You’re fucking crazy if you think that I’ll ever change]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/trouble.md#look-the-walls-closin-in-vyl-wnanory|I am I, I am me, I’ll never change my ways]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/trouble.

item.title: Killing You
item.description: [[songs/t/the_cure/bloodflowers/39.md#but-theres-nothing-left-to-burn-vyl-wnanory|You loved me for all the wrong reasons]] [[songs/t/the_cure/bloodflowers/39.md#but-theres-nothing-left-to-burn-vyl-wnanory|There’s nothing but pain left here I know]] [[songs/t/the_cure/bloodflowers/39.md#but-theres-nothing-left-to-burn-vyl-wnanory|What’s killing me is that I’m killing you]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/jesus_christ.

item.title: Morte et Dabo
item.description: [[songs/k/kidneythieves/trickstereprocess/veteran.md#but-now-its-all-over-vyl-wnanory|Morte et dabo]] [[songs/k/kidneythieves/trickstereprocess/veteran.md#but-now-its-all-over-vyl-wnanory|Morte et dabo]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/victim.md#and-some-say-this-cant-be-real-vyl-wnanory|So he came forth and said unto me]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/victim.md#and-some-say-this-cant-be-real-vyl-wnanory|Son, you are forsaken]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/victim.

item.title: Moving On
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_surrender.md#youve-got-secrets-oh-yeah-vyl-wnanory|A boy of anguish now he’s a man of soul]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_surrender.md#youve-got-secrets-oh-yeah-vyl-wnanory|Traded in his misery for the lonely life of the road]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/i_surrender.

item.title: Not The American Average
item.description: [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/delete_yourself/start_the_riot.md#1-2-3-4-vyl-wnanory|1, 2, 3, 4]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/yr_body_is_nothing/deep_well.md#she-said-vyl-wnanory|(All the things that she said was it all in my head?)]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/phoenix_flame.md#more-often-than-not-youre-gonna-feel-alone-vyl-wnanory|Come on baby]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/phoenix_flame.

item.title: Poison
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/invisible.md#you-didnt-get-your-way-vyl-wnanory|Imcompetent son of a bitch, keep your tongue tight]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/invisible.md#you-didnt-get-your-way-vyl-wnanory|Cut your losses you’re on thin ice so tread light]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/invisible.

item.title: Reckless & Relentless
item.description: [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/mockingbird.md#cause-youre-scared-i-aint-there-daddys-with-you-in-your-prayers-vyl-wnanory|Music is fucking dead]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/mockingbird.md#cause-youre-scared-i-aint-there-daddys-with-you-in-your-prayers-vyl-wnanory|It’s thanks to you cunts stabbing it in the fucking chest]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/mockingbird.md#cause-youre-scared-i-aint-there-daddys-with-you-in-your-prayers-vyl-wnanory|You, and every one of these fake, righteous, undeserving bands]] [[songs/e/eminem/curtain_call/mockingbird.

item.description: [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/new_blood.md#new-blood-vyl-wnanory|This world’s yours for the taking]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/new_blood.md#new-blood-vyl-wnanory|This world’s yours for the taking]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/new_blood.md#new-blood-vyl-wnanory|This world’s yours for the taking]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/new_blood.md#new-blood-vyl-wnanory|Run free]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/your_god.

item.title: Someone, Somewhere
item.description: [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/liberation.md#just-because-you-made-them-think-vyl-wnanory|Even though I’m on my own]] [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/liberation.md#just-because-you-made-them-think-vyl-wnanory|I know I’m not alone]] [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/liberation.md#just-because-you-made-them-think-vyl-wnanory|‘Cause I know there’s someone, somewhere]] [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/liberation.md#just-because-you-made-them-think-vyl-wnanory|Praying that I make it home]] [[songs/i/in_flames/sounds_of_a_playground_fading/liberation.

item.title: The Death Of Me
item.description: [[songs/s/spc_eco/under_my_skin/under_my_skin.md#im-just-trying-for-vyl-wnanory|Am I insane? I ask myself over and over and over again]] [[songs/s/spc_eco/under_my_skin/under_my_skin.md#im-just-trying-for-vyl-wnanory|Flies in my brain pouring out from the cracks in my skull]] [[songs/s/spc_eco/under_my_skin/under_my_skin.

item.title: The Match
item.description: [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/slipping_away.md#nothing-could-prepare-you-but-we-try-our-best-vyl-wnanory|Gather ‘round my friends]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/slipping_away.md#nothing-could-prepare-you-but-we-try-our-best-vyl-wnanory|I need a match and only one match]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/slipping_away.md#nothing-could-prepare-you-but-we-try-our-best-vyl-wnanory|I think it’s time I make my own way]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/slipping_away.

item.title: The Road
item.description: [[songs/a/asking_alexandria/from_death_to_destiny/killing_you.md#three-years-of-torment-and-torturous-love-vyl-wnanory|Street signs, so many street signs pass me by every night and]] [[songs/a/asking_alexandria/from_death_to_destiny/killing_you.md#three-years-of-torment-and-torturous-love-vyl-wnanory|I know tomorrow I won’t recognize the world]] [[songs/a/asking_alexandria/from_death_to_destiny/killing_you.

item.title: To The Stage
item.description: Go [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/j1m1.md#theyll-try-to-hurt-you-vyl-wnanory|I’m out the door, I’m on my ass again]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/j1m1.md#theyll-try-to-hurt-you-vyl-wnanory|Like every night before]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/j1m1.md#theyll-try-to-hurt-you-vyl-wnanory|I’m off the wall, out of my fucking mind]] [[songs/a/atari_teenage_riot/reset/j1m1.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/the_other_half.md#i-spanned-the-oceans-ive-seen-the-skies-thats-all-im-ever-gonna-need-to-get-by-vyl-wnanory|We’re back again]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/the_other_half.md#i-spanned-the-oceans-ive-seen-the-skies-thats-all-im-ever-gonna-need-to-get-by-vyl-wnanory|Let’s make a toast, come raise your glasses high]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/the_other_half.md#i-spanned-the-oceans-ive-seen-the-skies-thats-all-im-ever-gonna-need-to-get-by-vyl-wnanory|To every one of you who doubted us]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/dear_youth/the_other_half.

item.title: White Line Fever
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/your_god.md#i-tried-to-fight-but-did-you-listen-vyl-wnanory|As I breathe my disease brings me to my knees]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/your_god.md#i-tried-to-fight-but-did-you-listen-vyl-wnanory|All you need is a taste, it’ll set you free]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/come_whatever_may/your_god.
